alert.note: Alert for Laramie Valley (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 26 at 12:53AM MST until February 27 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Banner County, Kimball County and Cheyenne County. In Wyoming, Laramie Valley. * WHEN...From this evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow may create visibility reductions less than one mile at times.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
